title: What matters to you
description1: Before you make a choice between the two options, please take a moment to consider what matters most to you.
description2: Use the sliders below while you consider your feelings.
description3: Remember that there are no wrong answers.
labelSelecctedGraph1: Option 1 fits best with what matters to you
labelSelecctedGraph2: Option 2 fits best with what matters to you
